title: Did you move John McCain's body to Washington on the second flight?
subtitle: The aircraft commonly known as Air Force II was transporting John McCain and his family to Washington, D.C., on the last flight of the late Senator across the country.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The remains of Senator John McCain were transported to Washington, D.C., on the Boeing C-32A, which is usually used as the "second air force."
